abstract: Russia's Investigative Committee announces one person was killed and 10 wounded when at least one gunman opened fire in Derbent in Dagestan, southern Russian republic that has been focus of recruitment by Islamic State; attack is attributed to so-called Southern terrorist group, which has pledged allegiance to Islamic State.
lead_paragraph: A border guard was killed and 10 were wounded on the observation deck of an ancient citadel in Derbent, according to Russia’s Investigative Committee.

headline.main: Shooting in Dagestan, Focus of ISIS Recruiters, Leaves One Dead
headline.print_headline: Shooting in Dagestan, Focus of ISIS Recruiters, Leaves One Dead

snippet: A border guard was killed and 10 were wounded on the observation deck of an ancient citadel in Derbent, according to Russia’s Investigative Committee.
